name: Gmail: Inbox theme 2015 June
additional_info:
Credit to original author
https://userstyles.org/styles/111817/gmail-with-inbox-color-scheme

- Fixed original theme (last updated in march & now broken)
- Compacted nav menu
- compacted header for usability (move search left + user menu left align)
- Restored red compose button
- reduced whitespace at footer
